creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: profile and upper body of two men facing each other; L man has wide shoulders and wears a large plume on his hat, and a cape over PR arm; man at R has mustache, a furry hat with a feather, and a furry cloak
marks:
Signature

inscribed in graphite on recto, below monogram in plate, lower right: [SDB. fec.]
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Busts of Two Men Wearing Turbans with Feathers
